name: SOSWC
description: SOSWC is a focused initiative aimed at encouraging women to explore technology, build confidence through hands-on learning, and contribute meaningfully to open-source projects.

points.title: Inclusive Learning
points.content: A safe and supportive space for women to explore technology and open-source together.

points.title: Community & Growth
points.content: Encouraging confidence, collaboration, leadership and active participation in open-source ecosystems.

name: GDGoC
description: Google Developer Group on Campus (GDGoC) is a student-led university community supported by Google Developer Groups. It connects students passionate about technology with Google’s tools, resources, and industry mentors, enabling them to learn, collaborate, and build real-world projects using technologies like Android, Flutter, Firebase, Cloud, and AI.

points.title: Learn Google Technologies
points.content: Hands-on learning through workshops, study jams, and technical sessions focused on Google’s developer ecosystem.

points.title: Build & Collaborate
points.content: A platform for students from all majors to collaborate, build projects, and gain real-world development experience.
